MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the LL59 postcode area of Menai Bridge, affecting properties in Llandegfan and surrounding areas. This is causing flickering power to a number of properties. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7.26AM. Our engineers are on their way to the area and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 9.30AM. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 7.31AM on 20th December 2020.
